titles.title: To require the relocation of a National Weather Service radar tower which is on Sulphur Mountain near Ojai, California.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Environment.

bill.summary: 3/11/1999--Introduced. Requires the Secretary of Commerce to relocate the National Weather Service radar tower located on Sulphur Mountain near Ojai, California, to a new site which shall be selected so that the relocation: (1) will not result in degradation of service; and (2) will minimize the negative impacts of the radar tower and its emissions on residential areas. Mandates a report from the Secretary to the Congress.
